frontmatter.title: 5 Reasons you Should Build UIs Instead of CLIs
frontmatter.description: While the "Real Programmer" will always choose to use CLIs as they are the true sign of competence, good UIs with good defaults are actually the better choice when building tools of the average software engineer.
